value.title: DAX FRIDAYS! #178 : My age calculations in DAX and Power Query are wrong!! How do I do it?
value.excerpt: Calculating age is harder that you think, both in power query and dax.  In today's video, I am going to show you two ways to do it with DAX  and power query that get the closest to the actual age.  Do you know any other method to calculate age? Share it in the comments!  Link to previous power query

value.title: DAX Fridays! #179: Use a slicer to highlight values instead of filter them in Power BI ðŸ˜Ž
value.excerpt: Did you know that you can use a slicer in Power BI to highlight values instead of filtering them?  Let me show you the technique here, but if you are up for it, give it a go before and let us know what you came up to!  Pass multiple values from a slicer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_k_Qxb6pyCc  iscrossfilter

value.title: DAX Fridays! #180: Find text in columns using DAX
value.excerpt: There are a lot of functions that allow you to search for text in a column using DAX and I have already shown you a few, but here is one more!  Search and find DAX function tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vbQbQBX2T8A  in, containsrow DAX function tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rwSSMaBwBGQ

value.title: DAX Fridays! #181: Can't covert text into dates using DAX? Here is why...
value.excerpt: You should use power query to convert text into dates in power bi, but if you have a direct query or live connection and you need to do it in DAX, here is a tutorial of what works, what doesnt and what to watch for.  Enjoy!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: DAX Fridays! #182: Why your  Power BI tables sometimes filter, sometimes dont
value.excerpt: Why sometimes your tables filter each other and sometimes they dont?  As a beginner, this confused me deeply, so I hope this video will clarify this for you so you dont have to wonder anymore!  Understanding relationships: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-4ybWQSRcOY  Modeling playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDz00l_jz6zyfWLZIu8psvTESmKuVDUoG

value.title: DAX Fridays! #183: How to deal with multiple dates in Power BI
value.excerpt: So you have order date, shipped date, required date....and only one calendar. How do you manage that in power bi and DAX?  This scenario is often called role playing dimensions and in this video I will show you two ways to solve it. :) Happy Friday!!  Links to videos mentioned: Introduction to data modeling:

value.title: DAX Fridays! #33: Quick Measures
value.excerpt: In today's video I will review the new functionality released by Microsoft in the April 2017 Power BI update called Quick Measures.  Quick Measures is a new featured that has been released as a preview feature, so if you want to start using it, you need to activate it under Options and preview features.

value.title: DAX Fridays! #34: UNICHAR and REPT
value.excerpt: In todayâ€™s video I will show you  two new DAX functions: UNICHAR and REPT  UNICHAR DAX function allows you to display unicode symbols in Power BI and Excel.   REPT allows you to repeat text using DAX.  With both functions you can create a star rating visualization among other cool things.  Chris Web
